subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray kept Britain in contention in the Davis Cup finals when he beat Belgium’s Ruben Bemelmans in straight sets, leaving the teams level at 1-1 after the opening singles.
snippet: Andy Murray kept Britain in contention in the Davis Cup finals when he beat Belgium’s Ruben Bemelmans in straight sets, leaving the teams level at 1-1 after the opening singles.
